name: Naruto: Lets Guess
description: Naruto: Let's Guess is a scratch quiz game for Naruto anime fans. In this android game, you need to guess the name of Naruto characters. But the pictures will be covered. You need to scratch the picture in order to reveal it, but the more you reveal, the less point you will get! So, try to reveal less and get more points. Share your score with friends and have fun!
